sentences.en: A set of changes in the mongoose’s receptor makes it resemble the cobra’s own resistant receptor.

sentences.en: Anche il cobra , serpente con gli occhiali.

sentences.en: As It'strikes, the cobra holds on tight, ensuring the venom finds its mark.
sentences.cn: 在袭击时, 眼睛王蛇绷紧身体, 以确保毒液找到目标.

sentences.en: He realized there must be a cobra in the room.
sentences.cn: 这也就是说,这间房子里肯定有一条毒蛇.

sentences.en: However, when cornered, these snakes will raise their heads, sometimes with a third of their body off the ground, spread their cobra-like neck-flap, open their black mouths and hiss.
sentences.cn: 但是，当被逼到角落时，这些蛇就会抬起头部，有时会有三分之一脱离地面，舒展开它们眼镜蛇般的脖颈，打开黑色的嘴发出嘶嘶的声音。

sentences.en: Sometimes an attacking mongoose is bitten, but it has another line of defense against the venom — its acetylcholine receptor has also evolved so that the cobra neurotoxin cannot bind to it.
sentences.cn: 有时猫鼬也会被咬到，但它还有除了反应之外的第二种防御毒液的方式——它的乙酰胆碱受体同样进化到了不怕眼镜蛇神经毒素的地步。
